# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(BinaryStream LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_library(BinaryStream STATIC "")
set_target_properties(BinaryStream PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "BinaryStream")
# set_target_properties(BinaryStream PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(BinaryStream PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_definitions(BinaryStream PRIVATE
    NOMINMAX
    UNICODE
)
# target_compile_options(BinaryStream PRIVATE
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/EHsc>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/EHsc>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/utf-8>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/utf-8>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/W4>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/W4>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/O2>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/O2>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Ob3>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/Ob3>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
#     $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
# )
string(REPLACE "/EHsc" "" CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}")
set_target_properties(BinaryStream PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(BinaryStream PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
# if(CMAKE_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
#     target_compile_options(BinaryStream PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
# else()
#     target_compile_options(BinaryStream PRIVATE -Ofast)
# endif()
if(CMAKE_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
else()
    target_compile_options(BinaryStream PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
# if(CMAKE_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
#     set_property(TARGET BinaryStream PROPERTY
#         MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDLL")
# endif()
target_sources(BinaryStream PRIVATE
    src/binarystream/BinaryStream.cpp
    src/binarystream/ReadOnlyBinaryStream.cpp
    src/binarystream-c/bstream.cpp
)
